item.title: Are You Making This Common Mistake When Spelling Denim?
item.description: Introduction to Denim and Common Spelling Mistake Denim is one of the most beloved materials in the fashion world. It’s been around for centuries and is still popular today. However, many people make a common mistake when spelling the word “denim.” What is Denim? Denim is a sturdy cotton twill fabric with a distinctive diagonal ribbing. It was originally used for workwear, but has since become a popular material for fashion.
